3-5  都営・区市町村・公社・都市機構等賃貸住宅管理戸数（平成21～平成24年度末） 3-5  RENTAL HOUSING UNITS BY TYPE OF MANAGEMENT ( End of Fiscal Year  2009-2012 ）
注 1) ２市以上にまたがる都市再生機構の各団地は，それぞれの戸数の多くが所在する市に統一集計した。
2) 福祉住宅等には引揚者住宅及び小笠原住宅を含む。
3) ＊神奈川県相模原市所在の引揚者住宅。
4) 区市町村住宅の内訳は，公営：公営住宅，借上公営住宅 ／その他：特定公共賃貸住宅，特定優良賃貸住宅，改良住宅，区市町村単独住宅等。
Note: 1) Figures for Urban Renaissance Agency residences straddling two or more cities are included in the city where the majority of the residential units are located.
2) Welfare housing etc. includes repatriation housing and Ogasawara housing.
3) * Repatriation housing located in Kanagawa prefecture.

4) Municipal housing's "public" is public housing and leased public housing， and "others" include  specified public rental housing， specified good quality rental housing， upgraded housing， and housing built without state subsidies.
